body_html:
@MycChiu Just to add another data point, I ran your benchmark on my system and got very similar results:

vanilla times in seconds:
[ 0.392066 0.39233494 0.39980507]
batch_norm times in seconds:
[ 0.68308187 0.68399501 0.68293214]
layer_norm times in seconds:
[ 1.08977199 1.08793688 1.08768916]
batch_norm is 1.73X slower
layer_norm is 2.76X slower

body:
@MycChiu Just to add another data point, I ran your benchmark on my system and got very similar results:

vanilla times in seconds:
[ 0.392066    0.39233494  0.39980507]
batch_norm times in seconds:
[ 0.68308187  0.68399501  0.68293214]
